word: FOR MOST OF THE NEXT DECADE, MISS BOLTON WORKED FOR MRS. WHITE. AS THESE DOCUMENTS MAKE CLEAR, FROM THE VERY BEGINNING MRS. WHITE SENSED A CERTAIN INSTABILITY AND SPIRITUAL IMMATURITY IN MISS BOLTON. SEVERAL TIMES IN THE YEARS TO COME FANNIE VOICED CRITICISMS OF ELLEN WHITE AND DISSATISFACTION WITH THE FACT THAT THE LITERARY ASSISTANTS DID NOT GET MORE PUBLIC RECOGNITION FOR THEIR WORK.
